attributes.action: Have David Cameron resign from his post as PM
attributes.background: David Cameron has done nothing for this country but put us in danger. We have money to go to war, but can't resolve the national debts. It doesn't make sense, he needs to see how the public really think. This is not England this is an egotistical maniac putting us in a vulnerable position.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
